mapper.sql: uuid, delFlag, opeTime, oper, createTime, customerUuid, preceptUuid, serviceStaffUuid, visitUuid, refuseReason, applyState, visitType, visitState
mapper.select:
select
from visit_record where customerUuid = #{customerUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by opeTime desc
select count(customerUuid) from visit_record where serviceStaffUuid = #{serviceStaffUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select distinct(customerUuid) from visit_record where serviceStaffUuid = #{doctorUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by opeTime desc
